name: Sky Road
description:
Sky Road is a casual game for all ages. It doesn't take much effort. Choose an emotion for yourself and take a ride along the celestial road, collecting coins. The further you pass the more reward.
In the game you have to manage the clouds, and the chosen smiley in the store will confidently follow the path you have planned. For every tenth point, the reward will increase.

Управление:
Enter/Space — begin or restart;
a/d, ←/→ — rotate sky to the left/right;
Esc — exit.
